I like to eat food from my parents' home country.
I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
the death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years.

participant_2.background:
I wake up and immediately check the weather to see if it's a good day for a run.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
i have a girlfriend of 7 years.
i like to go on walks.
I am not sure what my family members do for a living.

content.text: Not much, just got home from work. How about you?
I'm doing well! I just made some dinner and am hanging out with my dog.
That sounds nice! I love dogs, I have a cat myself.
How long have you had your cat?
We've had him for about 7 years now. He's the best!
That's great! I've had my dog for about 8 years now. He's my best friend.
I love that! Pets are the best.
What do you do for work?
I work for a small, family-owned restaurant. It's pretty great.
That sounds fun! I love working in restaurants.
I do too! It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I agree. What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing is getting to meet new people and make new friends.
That's awesome! That's my favorite part about my job too.
It's such a great feeling to be able to make someone's day a little brighter.
I agree. It's what makes it all worth it
